ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
openssl:
- '3.5'
rust_compiler:
- rust
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version
zlib:
- '1'
zstd:
- '1.5'

about.description:
coreos-installer is a program to assist with installing Fedora CoreOS (FCOS)
and Red Hat Enterprise Linux CoreOS (RHCOS). It can:
- Install the operating system to a target disk, optionally customizing it
  with an Ignition config or first-boot kernel parameters
- Download and verify an operating system image for various cloud,
  virtualization, or bare metal platforms
- List Fedora CoreOS images available for download
- Embed an Ignition config in a live ISO image to customize the running system
- Wrap an Ignition config in an initrd image for PXE boot customization

coreos-installer is a program to assist with installing Fedora CoreOS (FCOS)
and Red Hat Enterprise Linux CoreOS (RHCOS). It can:
- Install the operating system to a target disk, optionally customizing it
  with an Ignition config or first-boot kernel parameters
- Download and verify an operating system image for various cloud,
  virtualization, or bare metal platforms
- List Fedora CoreOS images available for download
- Embed an Ignition config in a live ISO image to customize the running system
- Wrap an Ignition config in an initrd image for PXE boot customization

name: coreos-installer
raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: "coreos-installer"
  version: "0.25.0"

package:
  name: coreos-installer
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/coreos/${{ name }}/archive/refs/tags/v${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4a62a06c4eb3ec443bb30f135338e034da206793881425fe43f0343ec90649f2

build:
  number: 0
  skip:
    - win
    - osx
  script:
    env:
      OPENSSL_DIR: "${PREFIX}"
      OPENSSL_STATIC: "0"
      ZSTD_SYS_USE_PKG_CONFIG: "0"
    content:
      - cargo auditable install --features rdcore --locked --no-track --bins --root ${{ PREFIX }} --path .
      - cargo-bundle-licenses --format yaml --output ./THIRDPARTY.yml

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - ${{ compiler('rust') }}
    - cargo-bundle-licenses
    - cargo-auditable
    - cmake
    - make
    - pkg-config
  host:
    - openssl
    - zlib
    - zstd

tests:
  - package_contents:
      bin:
        - coreos-installer
        - rdcore
      strict: true
  - script:
      - coreos-installer --version
      - rdcore --help

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/coreos/coreos-installer
  summary: Installer for CoreOS disk images
  description: |
    coreos-installer is a program to assist with installing Fedora CoreOS (FCOS)
    and Red Hat Enterprise Linux CoreOS (RHCOS). It can:
    - Install the operating system to a target disk, optionally customizing it
      with an Ignition config or first-boot kernel parameters
    - Download and verify an operating system image for various cloud,
      virtualization, or bare metal platforms
    - List Fedora CoreOS images available for download
    - Embed an Ignition config in a live ISO image to customize the running system
    - Wrap an Ignition config in an initrd image for PXE boot customization
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file:
    - LICENSE
    - THIRDPARTY.yml
  repository: https://github.com/coreos/coreos-installer
  documentation: https://coreos.github.io/coreos-installer/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - phreed
